## Block.getListOfValues() method

Get the LOV for the given block and field

**Signature:**

```typescript
getListOfValues(field: string): ListOfValues;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field for which the LOV is retrieved. |

**Returns:**

[ListOfValues](./forms42core.listofvalues.md)

The List of Values (LOV) associated with the specified field.
